info.name: auth-api
info.description:
version=1.0.0
Below are the environment variables needed to run this collection with example value from DEV environment; 

base_url			:	sso-dev.pathfinder.gov.bc.ca
realm_name			:	fcf0kpqr
tokenUrl			:	https://sso-dev.pathfinder.gov.bc.ca/auth/realms/fcf0kpqr/protocol/openid-connect/token
clientId			:	sbc-auth-cron-job
clientSecret		:	<client_secret>
defaultGroup		:	basic/editor
api_url				:	http://localhost:5000
webClientId			:	sbc-auth-web
webClientSecret		:	<web_client_secret>
corp_num			:	CP0002098
user_email			:	test111@gov.bc.ca
temp_password		:	foobar
business_identifier	:	CP0002098
sample_email		:	foo@bar.com
sample_phone		:	(555)-555-5555
sample_extension	:	123
sample_updated_email:	test@bar.com
test_staff_username :	<test_staff_username>
test_staff_password :	<test_staff_password>
test_org_name		:	"Test Org"
test_org_name_updated:	"Test Org Updated"
business_number		:	791861073BC0001
business_name		:	"Foobar, Inc."
entity_passcode		:	12345
